Title: Quick question about RAM speeds and XMP profiles
Body: I just installed new DDR5 RAM (5600MHz) but my BIOS defaults it to 4800MHz. Should I just enable the XMP profile? Is there any risk to doing that, or is that standard procedure?

Title: Just discovered this hidden feature in my phone, mind blown 😲
Body: So I was messing around in the settings yesterday and stumbled upon this feature I never noticed before. Apparently, you can long-press the power button and it lets you take screenshots without touching the screen at all. Why was this not advertised anywhere? Literally saved me so many taps already. Anyone else just find this now or am I the last person on Earth to know?
